name: io.github.yuque/yuque-mcp
description: MCP server for Yuque (语雀) — expose your knowledge base to AI assistants. Supports document CRUD, search, repo management, team collaboration, and statistics.

environmentVariables.name: YUQUE_PERSONAL_TOKEN
environmentVariables.description: Yuque personal API token (get from https://www.yuque.com/settings/tokens). Use one of: YUQUE_PERSONAL_TOKEN, YUQUE_GROUP_TOKEN, or YUQUE_TOKEN.

environmentVariables.name: YUQUE_GROUP_TOKEN
environmentVariables.description: Yuque group/team API token (alternative to YUQUE_PERSONAL_TOKEN for team workspaces).

environmentVariables.name: YUQUE_TOKEN
environmentVariables.description: Yuque API token (legacy, use YUQUE_PERSONAL_TOKEN or YUQUE_GROUP_TOKEN instead).
